item.description: It’s Ross Givens here, with Chart of the Day. Barely 50 days ago, the small-cap Russell 2000 index scraped a 52-week low. Fast forward to yesterday, and it triumphantly closed at a 52-week high, accentuated by a significant 'gap up' in price action—a telltale sign of robust momentum. Small-cap stocks are orchestrating significant moves, ones you certainly wouldn't want to overlook. Join me as we dissect the dynamic shifts in the small-cap arena and explore the exciting opportunities unfolding in this market surge.

item.intro: Good day! It’s December 22nd, and on this day in 1882, the first string of electric Christmas lights was created. As we illuminate today’s top stories in The Balanced Brief, may they brighten your understanding and bring festive cheer to your intellect.
item.con: Thomas Edison said, 'We will make electricity so cheap that only the rich will burn candles.' As today’s briefing ends, let's appreciate the light of knowledge that is more accessible than ever. May it brighten your path to tomorrow's discoveries.
